005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import javax.xml.XMLConstants;
009import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
013
014public interface INamed {
015
016  /**
017   * Retrieve the name of the model element.
018   *
019   * @return the name
020   */
021  @NonNull
022  String getName();
023
024  /**
025   * Retrieve the name to use for the model element, instead of the name.
026   *
027   * @return the use name or {@code null} if no use name is defined
028   */
029  // from INamedModelElement
030  @Nullable
031  default String getUseName() {
032    // no use-name by default
033    return null;
034  }
035
036  /**
037   * Get the name to use based on the provided names. This method will return the
038   * use name provided by {@link #getUseName()} if the call is not {@code null},
039   * and fall back to the name provided by {@link #getName()} otherwise. This is
040   * the model name to use for the for an instance where the instance is
041   * referenced.
042   *
043   * @return the use name if available, or the name if not
044   *
045   * @see #getUseName()
046   * @see #getName()
047   */
048  // from INamedModelElement
049  @NonNull
050  default String getEffectiveName() {
051    @Nullable String useName = getUseName();
052    return useName == null ? getName() : useName;
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * Retrieve the XML namespace for this instance.
057   * <p>
058   * Multiple calls to this method are expected to produce the same, deterministic
059   * return value.
060   *
061   * @return the XML namespace or {@code null} if no namespace is defined
062   */
063  @Nullable
064  default String getXmlNamespace() {
065    return getXmlQName().getNamespaceURI();
066  }
067
068  /**
069   * Get the unique XML qualified name for this model element.
070   * <p>
071   * The qualified name is considered to be unique relative to all sibling
072   * elements. For a flag, this name will be unique among all flag instances on
073   * the same field or assembly definition. For a field or assembly, this name
074   * will be unique among all sibling field or assembly instances on the same
075   * assembly definition.
076   * <p>
077   * Multiple calls to this method are expected to produce the same, deterministic
078   * return value.
079   * <p>
080   * If {@link #getXmlNamespace()} is {@code null}, the the resulting QName will
081   * have the namespace {@link XMLConstants#NULL_NS_URI}.
082   * <p>
083   * This implementation may be overridden by implementation that cache the QName
084   * or provide for a more efficient method for QName creation.
085   *
086   * @return the XML qualified name, or {@code null} if there isn't one
087   */
088  // REFACTOR: rename to getQName
089  @NonNull
090  QName getXmlQName();
091
092  /**
093   * Retrieve the index value to use for binary naming.
094   *
095   * @return the name index or {@code null} if no name index is defined
096   */
097  // from INamedModelElement
098  @Nullable
099  default Integer getIndex() {
100    // no index by default
101    return null;
102  }
103
104  /**
105   * Retrieve the index value to use for binary naming, instead of the name.
106   *
107   * @return the use name index or {@code null} if no use name index is defined
108   */
109  // from INamedModelElement
110  @Nullable
111  default Integer getUseIndex() {
112    // no use-name index by default
113    return null;
114  }
115
116  /**
117   * Get the index value to use for binary naming based on the provided index
118   * values.
119   * <p>
120   * This method will return the use index value provided by
121   * {@link #getUseIndex()} if the call result is not {@code null}, and fall back
122   * to the index value provided by {@link #getIndex()} otherwise.
123   *
124   * @return the index value if available, or {@code null} otherwise
125   */
126  // from INamedModelElement
127  @Nullable
128  default Integer getEffectiveIndex() {
129    @Nullable Integer useIndex = getUseIndex();
130    return useIndex == null ? getIndex() : useIndex;
131  }
132}
